title: Troubled World Heralds Next Stage of the Defense Stocks Rally
description: If the tumultuous first 10 days of 2026 have convinced investors in Europe and Asia of anything, it’s that defense stocks are poised for another strong year.
content: If the tumultuous first 10 days of 2026 have convinced investors in Europe and Asia of anything, it’s that defense stocks are poised for another strong year.
